welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Davidson, a charming city known for its beautiful lake and quaint downtown area. We hope you'll enjoy your stay and discover all the wonderful attractions this city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Concord-Padgett Regional Airport serves all commercial flights and offers a variety of amenities for passengers.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Concord-Padgett Regional Airport caters to private and charter flights, providing a comfortable and convenient experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Charlotte Douglas Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Charlotte Douglas Airport serves American Airlines flights.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Charlotte Douglas Airport serves American Airlines and United Airlines flights.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C at Charlotte Douglas Airport serves American Airlines and Delta Air Lines flights.

terminals.name: Concourse D
terminals.description: Concourse D at Charlotte Douglas Airport serves American Airlines and Lufthansa flights.

terminals.name: Concourse E
terminals.description: Concourse E at Charlotte Douglas Airport serves American Airlines and JetBlue Airways flights.

terminals.name: Concourse F
terminals.description: Concourse F at Charlotte Douglas Airport serves American Airlines and Southwest Airlines flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Statesville Municipal Airport offers a variety of amenities for travelers, including restaurants, shops, and rental car services.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Statesville Municipal Airport caters to private and corporate flights, offering luxurious lounges and personalized services.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Rowan County Airport serves all commercial flights and houses various amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Rowan County Airport caters to private and chartered flights, offering a more exclusive and personalized experience for travelers.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport for all travelers.
